transportAdvice: Palermo's historic center is compact and walkable, making it easy to reach most major sights on foot; the city also has a bus network that covers tourist areas, and taxis are widely available at stands throughout the city.

weather.description: Cool and occasionally rainy with mild temperatures, a quiet time to visit with few crowds.
Still cool and unsettled with some rain, but days can be pleasantly mild and sunny.
Spring begins to emerge with warming temperatures and a mix of sun and showers.
Mild and increasingly sunny, an excellent month for sightseeing with comfortable temperatures.
Warm and largely dry with long sunny days, ideal conditions for exploring the city and coast.
Hot and sunny with very little rain, perfect beach weather and vibrant street life.
Peak summer heat with intense sun and virtually no rain; stay hydrated and seek shade midday.
The hottest month, very busy with tourists; sea temperatures are warm and evenings are lively.
Warm and mostly sunny with the crowds thinning, one of the best months to visit.
Pleasantly warm early in the month, becoming cooler and rainier as autumn sets in.
Noticeably cooler with more frequent rain, though mild days still occur and crowds are sparse.
Cool and occasionally wet with a festive atmosphere in the city center around the holidays.
